Description: A 15-year-old child received significant burn injuries following a flash fire and explosion that resulted from the crushing of aerosol canisters in a waste and recycling unit where control measures for the activity fell far below the expected standards required, breach of Section 2(1) and Section 3(1) of the Health and Safety at Work Act 1974
Address: Sandy Lane Industial Estate/AA & S Metal Recycling LimitedSandy Lane Industrial EstateSTOURPORT-ON-SEVERNWorcestershireDY13 9QBEngland
